name: Simple Buttermilk Coffee Cake
author: Amy
summary: This coffee cake is a great treat anytime of the day. It's great for breakfast, brunch, or dessert. It's extremely easy to make and will always be a hit at the party!
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Grease and flour a 9x13-inch baking dish
Combine flour, sugar, baking powder, and baking soda in a large bowl
Cut butter into flour mixture until mixture resembles coarse crumbs
Stir buttermilk, eggs, and vanilla extract into remaining crumbs until batter is just combined; pour batter into prepared baking dish
Sprinkle reserved butter crumbs over batter
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 35 minutes
